content: **pattern notes** trinket is a fun carry-along yarn that has colorful tweedy nubs to give your project a complex and interesting effect one strand each of trinket and anti-pilling everyday worsted gradient are held together throughout this project the scarf is worked flat from end to end when joining a new ball of gradient yarn join where the color tones match for best results **skills/techniques used in this pattern ** chain and half_double_crochet stitches adding fringe **finished measurements ** width 11¼ length 90 **gauge ** 5 v-sts x 12 row = 4 in patt with 1 strand of each yarn held together **materials ** premier® yarns anti-pilling everyday® worsted gradient 100% anti-pilling acrylic 20% nylon 7oz/200g 360yds/330m 2115-01 green tones 2 balls premier® yarns trinket™ 75% acrylic 20% nylon 1 76oz/50g 437yds/400m 2161-01 citrine - 2 balls **hook & notions ** us size i-9 5 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle 10 piece of cardboard
